Package managers

Class ActivityManager

java.lang.Object
managers.ActivityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher
public class ActivityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Publisher
Class that handles operations tied with activities.
Since:
22.06.2020.

  • Method Details

    • addActivity

      public boolean addActivity​(java.lang.String description, java.lang.String amount, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String activity, java.lang.String date, int hours, int minutes)
      Function that takes all parameters needed to add an activity, checks them, parses if needed and calls DatabaseManager.addActivity(String, int, String, String, LocalDateTime) method. notifyObservers() is called after successfully adding the activity.
      Parameters:
      description - String : activity's description
      amount - String : string representation of the activity's amount
      currency - String : activity's currency
      activity - String : activity's version(income or expense)
      date - String : string representation of activity's date
      hours - int : activity's hour
      minutes - int : activity's minutes
      Returns:
      indicator whether the activity was successfully added

    • getActivities

      public java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getActivities​(java.lang.String activity, java.lang.String fromDate, java.lang.String toDate, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String description)
      Function that returns activities that fulfill the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      activity - String : activity's version
      fromDate - String : activities after this date
      toDate - String : activities before this date
      currency - String : activity's currency
      description - String : activity's description
      Returns:
      list of activities

    • getActivitiesDescriptions

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getActivitiesDescriptions()
      Function that returns all descriptions of activities.
      Returns:
      list of descriptions
